childMarkdownRemark.html: Attained the Expert Traditional Web Developer certification. This exam covers all areas of OutSystems traditional web development including application and environment configuration, development best practices, architecture and asynchronous processes. Able to design and architect quality solutions autonomously.
Passed the Professional Traditional Web Developer exam, which focuses on advanced development topics such as integrations, architecture and performance.
Attained the Outsystems Architecture Specialist certification. Able to design, build and maintain a good architectural landscape of Outsystems applications.
Certified for the Reactive developer course. Able to build Reactive web apps based on Outsystems 11.
Going beyond the basics of building Outsystems applications. Certified for the Mobile Developer Specialist course, which focuses on the developing native apps with offline scenarios.
Certified for Professional Scrum Master 1 course. Learned more about topics as Agile work processes, SCRUM roles and responsibilities.
Followed the Web development course path. Learning Javascript, CSS & HTML. See my work to see what I've made so far!
Certified for the Traditional Web developer course. Able to build web apps based on Outsystems 11.
Earned MS300 certification for deploying and managing Office365 at PeopleCert.
Earned ITIL V3 certification for managing IT business processes at Microsoft.

nodes.name: HBO Bachelor of Arts: Product design

childMarkdownRemark.html: Graduated at HBO bachelor Product designer at Willem the Kooning Academy. Learned managing creative processes like prototyping, testing and researching a target audience.
Graduated at HAVO at CSG Prins Maurits.
